io.vertx.ext.consul

Class TxnKVOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.ext.consul.TxnKVOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TxnOperation

    public class TxnKVOperation
extends Object
implements TxnOperation
    Holds operation to apply to the key/value store inside a transaction
    Author:
    Ruslan Sennov
